## Postdoctoral researchers

We typically do not have existing funding to support postdoctoral researchers. 
If you are interested in joining our group as a postdoctoral researcher, you will most likely need to find self-funding and ask if we can host and work with you. 

## PhD students

If you are interested in joining our group as a PhD student, you should wait for an open position (see below) and apply. 
Our [Industrial and Systems Engineering PhD program](https://umdearborn.edu/academics/program/industrial-and-systems-engineering-phd) is affiliated with the [Rackham Graduate School](https://rackham.umich.edu/) at the [University of Michigan](https://umich.edu/) and is administered by the [University of Michigan-Dearborn](https://umdearborn.edu/). 

The PhD positions are full time and fully funded.
Admitted students are guaranteed financial support for up to five years, including tuition, a monthly stipend, and health insurance. 
The financial support is given in the form of a Graduate Student Research Assistant (GSRA) or a Graduate Student Instructor (GSI).
Note you are *not* required to have a Master's degree to join our PhD program.
